```{r publications}
combine_strings <- function(s) {
  paste(s, collapse = ", ")
}

clean_strings <- function(s) {
  unlist(s) %>% stringr::str_squish() %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\{|\\}", "*")
}

highlight_me <- function(authors) {
  ifelse(str_detect(authors, "Joshua"), glue::glue("**{authors}**"), authors)
}

format_authors <- function(pub) {
  as.character(pub$author) %>%
    unlist() %>%
    highlight_me() %>%
    combine_strings() %>%
    clean_strings()
}

print_pubs <- function(pub) {
  glue_template <- "
  ### {title}

  *{journal}*

  N/A

  {year}

  {authors}

  "

  data <- list(
    title = clean_strings(pub$title),
    journal = clean_strings(pub$journal),
    year = pub$year,
    authors = format_authors(pub)
  )

  print(glue::glue_data(data, glue_template))
  return(NULL)
}


pubs <- bibtex::read.bib(here::here("publications.bib"))
purrr::walk(pubs, print_pubs)
```
